Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Authorizes Michael V. Layman to receive state police retirement credit for services performed as a SUNY police officer
Summary: Authorizes Michael V. Layman to receive state police retirement credit for services performed as a SUNY police officer.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the granting of retirement service credit in the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to Michael V. Layman for service as a university police officer
